description.en: Adbank is a powerful online ad platform built on Ethereum to remove costly middlemen & dramatically reduce the $50 billion problem of ad fraud using advanced AI technology. By using the Adbank platform, publishers can get paid more for their content while charging advertisers less and creating a transparent ecosystem that benefits all key stakeholders in the industry. Existing ad platforms will be able to access cutting edge anti-fraud AI tools through Adbank’s API and powered with ADB tokens.
